item.description:
FREE ADVANCED SCREENING

** THE WACKNESS **




Wednesday, April 23rd @ 7:30pm
Regal Fenway Theater



From Sony Picture Classics with a cast starring Ben Kingsley, Mary-Kate Olsen, and Method Man, winner of the 2008 Sundance Film Festival Audience Award and nominated for the Grand Jury Award -- this is one screening you don't want to mis!. Join us for this very special sneak peak, a full 3 months before the film is released in theaters! See synopsis and trailer link below.


THE WACKNESS


Please print out the pass located in the group's file for admission, each pass admits two - feel free to print as many as you need. Just as an FYI: seating is not guaranteed and is available on a first come first served basis, so arrive early!



Synopsis:
It's the summer of 1994, and the streets of New York are pulsing with hip-hop and wafting with the sweet aroma of marijuana-- but change is in the air. The newly-inaugurated mayor, Rudy Giuliani, is beginning to implement his anti-fun initiatives against "crimes" like noisy portable radios, graffiti and public drunkenness. Set against this backdrop, Luke Shapiro (Josh Beck) spends his last summer before college selling dope throughout New York City, trading it with his shrink (Ben Kingsley) for therapy, while crushing on his step-daughter (Olivia Thirlby). Famke Janssen, Mary Kate Olsen, and Method Man round out the cast in this edgy, bittersweet, and funny coming of age story.

Opening: July 2008

Trailer
<object width="425" height="355"><embed src="http://www.youtube.co... type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="425" height="355" style="margin : 5px ; max-width : 700px ; max-height : 700px"></embed></object>
item.why: Winner of the 2008 Sundance Film Festival Audience Award. Starring Ben Kingsley, Mary-Kate Olsen, and Method Man, This film is not being released until July, this is an opportunity to catch the film months before its release date!
item.name: FREE ADVANCED SCREENING - THE WACKNESS
